kolambaa nagaraya kramayen alankara nagarayak bawata pariwarthanaya wemin thibena bawada penennata thibe.rawaya karthru wiktar ayiwan mahatha ese kiya sitinne kolambaa nagara sanwardhana wiwadaya hisin pala kara athi lipiyeni.kolambaa nagaraya lassana karannata gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha diyath kara athi wadapiliwela ihalin agaya karana wiktar ayiwan mahatha gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha gana mese sandahan kara siti.gotabhaya rajapaksha yuddhaye di loku bhumikawak rangapamada sanwardhana karyayakadi ewani sarthaka bhumikawak rangapamata ohuta haki yayi ma muladi wishwasa kale naha.eheth ohu ema wishayata da dakshayaku bawa ohu sanatha kara thibe.rajapaksha pawule aya sathutu kirimata mewannak noliyana bawa kiyana wiktar ayiwan mahatha honda deyak kawuru kalada eya agaya kala yuthu bawa kiya siti.kolambaa nagaraye wathu palpath ha mudukkuwala jiwath wana pawul sankhyawa 66000 k bawath eka pawulakata watena pudgalayan sankhyawa pahak lesa salakuwada ee ganayata watena janagahanaye sankhyawa thunlaksha thisdahasak bawath ayiwan mahatha ema lipiyen kiya siti.mulu pawulakma jiwathwanne minisun godanagili ha wasikilida athuluwa warga adi 91.16 ka bhumi pramanayakaya.
shabde nam punchammage wageyi.
